attributes.action: cease with immediate effect, the constant and intrusive mountain of taxes, stealth or otherwise, forced upon the working men and women of this country. and to cease the constant stream of intrusive and appalling network of Home Inspectors and others whos sole aim is to gather information against the public to be used solely to monetarily penalise further, the people of this country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The idea of this petition is to strike back at a Government hell-bent on taxing, by any method the people of England. I propose that a date is set, dependant on the response to this petition, of September the 1st 2007, and this date (or the next working day)becomes the date of a one day national strike. Followed by a two day strike on the 1st of October (or the next working days), and so on until the people of England get a credible and legitimate response from this Government.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
